title: Infinite Looping, PVP.KERNAL FAIL....
body: I had infinite looping issues so I did a uninstall/reinstall. that didn't work now I'm stuck on "PVP.KERNAL Failure" Windows automatically shuts it down and it doesn't work. It says Windows will notify when solution is figured out. Ive done the clock resets, I've DL the hectech repair tool ran it. Checked the logs. Ran it as administrator and that doesn't work either...nothing seems to work atm.  Submitted a ticket and got a Bot, requested for human after following instructions and still nothing. anyone else still having this issue?

replies.body: That Kernel error is quite often a good sign that League isn't able to access certain game files due to admin rights. Run through our [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your OS is giving League permission to access it's own game files.
